attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i think that due to advertistment! many people have got in to far more debt in this country than they would  do in normal circumstances as it is to freely available to get but hard to pay for in the long run!
we do not teach our children how to understand finances in school like many countrys do! so do ended up in more debt!
